Scripts.OnEnter: if (self.tooltip) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltipTitle) GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltip, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end
if StoreRefundFrame.selectedItemGUID ~= self.data.itemGUID then self.BackgroundHighlight:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if StoreRefundFrame.selectedItemGUID ~= self.data.itemGUID then self.BackgroundHighlight:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
if ( not self:IsEnabled() ) then self.Left:SetTexCoord(0.26464844, 0.31542969, 0.89160156, 0.92285156) self.Middle:SetTexCoord(0.18457031, 0.25683594, 0.96484375, 0.99609375) self.Right:SetTexCoord(0.98046875, 0.99707031, 0.29980469, 0.33105469) end
self.PlayGlowAnim = function() self.LeftGlow.animIn:Play() self.RightGlow.animIn:Play() self.MiddleGlow.animIn:Play() end
self.StopGlowAnim = function() self.LeftGlow.animIn:Stop() self.RightGlow.animIn:Stop() self.MiddleGlow.animIn:Stop() end
self.ShowGlow = function(self, animToggle, alpha) if animToggle then self:PlayGlowAnim() else self:StopGlowAnim() end
local glowAlpha = alpha or 1
self.LeftGlow:Show() self.RightGlow:Show() self.MiddleGlow:Show()
self.LeftGlow:SetAlpha(glowAlpha) self.RightGlow:SetAlpha(glowAlpha) self.MiddleGlow:SetAlpha(glowAlpha) end

self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent().OverlayElements:GetFrameLevel() + 5) if not self:GetParent().Buttons then self:GetParent().Buttons = {} end
self:GetParent().Buttons[self:GetID()] = self

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.id == 2 then local altCurrency = self:GetParent().currency if altCurrency and altCurrency ~= 0 then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(string.format("item:%d", altCurrency)) GameTooltip:Show() end end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.showRetrievingText = true self.Text:SetText(STORE_WAIT_SERVER_RESPONSE) self.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)

Scripts.OnClick: SendAddonMessage("ACMSG_SHOP_REFUNDABLE_PURCHASE_LIST_REQUEST", nil, "WHISPER", UnitName("player")) StoreConfirmationFrame:Hide() StoreModelPreviewFrame:Hide() StoreErrorFrame:Hide() SpecialOfferInfoFrame:Hide() SpecialOfferDetailsInfoFrame:Hide() StoreBuyPremiumFrame:Hide() StoreSpecialOfferDetailFrame:Hide() StoreRefundFrame:Show()

local data = { ID = -1, Texture = "Interface\\Store\\Wow-Store-Circle", Name = STORE_TRANSMOGRIFY_REFRESH_TITLE, DescriptionText = STORE_REFRESH_DESC, Flags = 0, Price = 10, smallFormat = true, selfSize = {403, 320}, noticeSize = {400, 132}, confirmationFunc = function() SendServerMessage("ACMSG_SHOP_RENEW_ITEMS", selectedCategoryID) end }
StoreFrame_ProductBuy(data)

Scripts.OnHide:
local offerCount = StoreGetSpecialOfferCount()
if offerCount > 0 then self:GetParent().NavigationBar.PageText:ClearAllPoints() self:GetParent().NavigationBar.PrevPageButton:ClearAllPoints()
self:GetParent().NavigationBar.PageText:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", -74, 17) self:GetParent().NavigationBar.PrevPageButton:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", -40, 7)
self:GetParent().LeftPanel:Show()
self:GetParent().Background:SetTexCoord(0, 0.5634765625, 0.02734375, 1) self:GetParent().Border:SetVertexColor(1, 1, 1) end

FontString.name: $parentDescriptionText
FontString.text: Покажи всем насколько ты суров. Оседлай эту колесницу смерти. Или подари своему другу!

Scripts.OnClick:
local data = { ID = -1, Texture = "Interface\\Store\\Wow-Store-Circle", Name = selectedCategoryID == 4 and STORE_PET_REFRESH_TITLE or STORE_MOUNT_REFRESH_TITLE, DescriptionText = STORE_REFRESH_DESC, Flags = 0, Price = 3, smallFormat = true, selfSize = {403, 320}, noticeSize = {400, 132}, confirmationFunc = function() SendServerMessage("ACMSG_SHOP_RENEW_ITEMS", selectedCategoryID) end }
StoreFrame_ProductBuy(data)

Scripts.OnShow:
if selectedMoneyID and (selectedMoneyID ~= 3 and selectedMoneyID ~= 4) then PlaySound("igCharacterInfoOpen") end
self:SetSize(415, 565)
self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, 40)
Scripts.OnHide: if selectedMoneyID and (selectedMoneyID ~= 3 and selectedMoneyID ~= 4) then PlaySound("igCharacterInfoClose") end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(STORE_EXTRA_SUBSCRIBE, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:AddLine(STORE_EXTRA_SUBSCRIBE_TOOLTIP, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b, true) if self:IsEnabled() == 0 then GameTooltip:AddLine(STORE_EXTRA_SUBSCRIBE_TOOLTIP_WAITING_THE_END, RED_FONT_COLOR.r, RED_FONT_COLOR.g, RED_FONT_COLOR.b, true) end GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 ) then self.IconTexture:SetPoint("LEFT", 7, -2) self.IconTextureHighlight:SetPoint("LEFT", 7, -2) self.TopLine:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 51, -14) self.TopLine:SetPoint("RIGHT", -20, 0) self.MiddleLine:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLine, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, -4) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 ) then self.IconTexture:SetPoint("LEFT", 8, 0) self.IconTextureHighlight:SetPoint("LEFT", 8, 0) self.TopLine:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 52, -12) self.TopLine:SetPoint("RIGHT", -20, 0) self.MiddleLine:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLine, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, -4) end

FontString.text: Спасибо, что обновились до последней версии. Это обновление было большего размера, чем обычно, но оно очень необходимо для дальнейшего развития нашего проекта. В качестве компенсации вы получаете три дня поставок.
